name: 5-in-1 Arcade Hits
description:
Play alone or challenge your friends in one of many multiplayer modes using a single PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system in hot-hand mode, or two players simultaneously in a glorious Tetroid "versus battle". Collect all the golden medals, beat the best scores and set new records. Compare your skills to the abilities of our testers and for the first time ever in a Minis game, upload your results into global leader boards to see how you are standing against the world. 5-in-1 Arcade Hits is the most loaded up Minis game to date!

2010 Grip Digital s.r.o. All rights reserved. Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
